author: Anonymous Mouse
title: Error Clarification
student_answer: You might want to post your @dd-template-rules code to make it easier but I'm pretty sure it's because you didn't put a dash between one-of.
instructor_answer:
If you read the message slowly word by word it says:

One  is  not one-of …

So the word it is complaining about is one. 

Does that help?
